name: Space Abyss (Alpha Coders)
description:
• Explore A Galaxy Full Of Planets, Asteroids, Crashed Ships, and Player Built Space Stations
  • Many Different Planet Types To Explore
  • A Classless System - Switch Bodies Instead! (Become A Space Octopus!)
  • Build Larger And Better Ships - And Walk Around On Them

Please Note: You will need to create an account to play Space Abyss

  1. Register at https://space.alphacoders.com/user/register
  2. Create a player at: https://space.alphacoders.com/player/create
  3. You're good to go! The sign in for the game will ask for your Space Abyss Email, Player Name, and Password.

PC Controls:

  • Arrows - Moving
  • Left Mouse Button - Show Information/Use
  • Right Mouse Button - Show Options

Currently Space Abyss only supports a mouse and keyboard
